headline.main: BROOKLYN SPEEDS WORK ON OFFENSE; Leckonby Is Groomed to Start Against Steelers -- Status of Parker Still Uncertain EAKIN REPLACES ESHMONT Tried at Left Half by Giants, but Coach Hopes Len Will Be Able to Face Rams

lead_paragraph: Brooklyn's revivified Dodgers, apparently out of the running three weeks ago but now a definite threat for Eastern honors in the National Football League, will leave for Pittsburgh at 10:30 tomorrow night. On Sunday, at Forbes Field, Dr. John Bain (Jock) Sutherland's men will attempt to add the Pittsburgh Steelers to their list of recent victims, who, in succession, include the Giants, Eagles and Redskins.
